channel.title: How to Make it so when i use item on item it does all items?
channel.description: When I use an item on another item it gives xp, says something and then makes another item, how do i make it so that it does this for all the items in my inventory? I am using berkey scape source.

item.title: How to Make it so when i use item on item it does all items?
item.dc:creator: @elektrey elektrey
item.description:
@elektrey wrote:

That’s what i have and it works- I want it to do it to all the items in the inventory.

Read full topic
item.source: How to Make it so when i use item on item it does all items?

item.title: How to Make it so when i use item on item it does all items?
item.dc:creator: @xpatx xpatx
item.description:
@xpatx wrote:

if(itemUsed == ID & usedWith == ID) { addItem(ID, 1); sendMessage("You've created an item."); addSkillXP(playerLevel[5], 100); }

I didn’t do all the variables correctly, but you might have to swap them around and what not
